title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in the property sheet.
EB: The ComboBoxCellEditor should resize properly in the property sheet.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Select a cell in the ComboBox column.
3. Observe the size of the ComboBoxCellEditor.
